text: salamdeul-iyeo hanaui biyuleul deusa geugeos-e gwileul giul-ila hana nim anin daleun geos-e guwonhaneun jadeul-eun geudeul-i on him-eul da mo-eunda hae do gyeolko pali hanmali jochado changjohaji moshamyeo geu paliga geudeullobu teo mueos-ingaleul gajyeogandahaedo geudeul-eun geugeos-eulo buteo geugeos-eul guhaji moshani sungbaejaga usang-eun heoyaghal ppun-ila
